text: (Bhala kuch thikana hai us shaks ki gumraahi ka) jiske liye uska bura amal khushnuma bana diya gaya ho aur woh usey accha samajh raha ho? Haqeeqat yeh hai ke Allah jisey chahta hai gumrahi mein daal deta hai aur jisey chahta hai raah e raast dikha deta hai.Pas (aey Nabi) kha-ma-kha tumhari jaan in logon ki khatir gham-o-afsos mein na ghulay. Jo kuch yeh kar rahey hain Allah usko khoob jaanta hai
